text:
It's actually you who's early. And it's good to see you're
energetic. Seems like you managed the training camp well.

Y-Yes! I made sure to take it easy
and go at my own pace...!

Haha, yeah!
...I'd be happy if it was a fulfilling time for you, Koito.

But, aren't you a bit tired?
Is it okay to be the first one here on the way back?

I-I am a bit tired...
But, I wanted to come early...!

...It'd be nice if you could be
the first one to arrive... right?

Then consider being the first one here a reward.
Let me treat you to some juice or something.
